briefdescription.para: A bad argument was passed to a function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called when the Reset command is received. It resets all metrics, which include the Dropped Message Count, Queued Message Count, Software Bus Message Count, and Sent Message Count.

parameterdescription.para: A TO_ChannelData_t pointer that references the channel data structure

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called at when the application is about to load a new configuration table. This will flush the queues and deallocate the messages contained in the queues.

parameterdescription.para: A TO_ChannelData_t pointer that references the channel data structure

simplesect.para: 0 if successful. OSAL error if unsuccessful.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called at when the application has loaded a new configuration table.
CFE_SUCCESS if no error occurred. On error, an OSAL error is returned indicating what error occured.

briefdescription.para: Get the next message flow object.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is used by the classifier to get the next message flow object with the specified message ID.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgId_t that references the software bus message.
A TO_ChannelData_t pointer that references the channel data structure
Pointer to a value that will be set to the array index of the message flow object returned. Value is not set if a NULL pointer passed in.

simplesect.para: It is safe to give a null pointer as the third argument because the function checks if the Index pointer is NULL If it is NULL and will not assign it if it is NULL. The Index contents can however be zero.
Pointer to the TO_MessageFlow_t object when successful. NULL pointer when unsuccessful.

briefdescription.para: Get priority queue object for the message flow.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is used by the classifier to get the priority queue object from the message flow object.

parameterdescription.para: A TO_ChannelData_t pointer that references the channel data structure
A TO_MessageFlow_t pointer that references the message flow.
Pointer to a value that will be set to the array index of the message flow object returned. Value is not set if a NULL pointer passed in.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the TO_PriorityQueue_t object when successful. NULL pointer when unsuccessful.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16 ChannelIdx, CFE_SB_MsgId_t MsgID, uint16 MsgLimit, uint16 PQueueIdx)
memberdef.name: TO_MessageFlow_Add

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function adds message flow, if the message flow is not found on a given channel.
ChannelIdx
Index for a given channel
MsgID
A CFE_SB_MsgId_t that references the software bus message.
MsgLimit
The maximum messages the message flow queue will contain before overflowing.
PQueueIdx
Index of the priority queue.
TRUE if added. FALSE if not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function removes a message flow from a given channel if it is found.

parameterdescription.para: Index for a given channel Ground = 0, Radio = 1, Storage = 2
A CFE_SB_MsgId_t that references the software bus message.

simplesect.para: TRUE if message flow is found and removed. FALSE if not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function queries a message flow to determine if it exists on a given channel.

parameterdescription.para: Index for a given channel Ground = 0, Radio = 1, Storage = 2
A CFE_SB_MsgId_t that references the software bus message.

simplesect.para: TRUE if message flow is found. FALSE if not found.
